# uptime-kuma_monitor (Resource)

Monitor Resource

  accepted_statuscodes = [

    # ...
  }
  port                      = 6
  proxy_id                  = "{ \"see\": \"documentation\" }"

  resend_interval           = 7
  retry_interval            = 8
  tags = [

  ]

  upside_down = true
